title: Chords That Ukulele Players Really Want To Know
description: Barry Maz, author of the bestselling ukulele handbook series 'What Ukulele Players Really Want To Know' and the Got A Ukulele website returns with a handy addition to the ukulele players bookshelf.Chords That Ukulele Players Really Want To Know provides clear chord diagrams for the most common ukulele tunings in a format that can be carried around on an ereader, iPhone or iPad. In other words, wherever you are, you can have your chord charts with you for easy reference.The book contains over 300 clear chord charts including- key chords for the standard GCEA ukulele- popular beginners chords for the Baritone (DGBE) ukulele- chords for both GCEA and DGBE in left handed notationWhilst you may have chord charts at home, a ukulele chord book you can carry with you at all times is a must have download.
author: Barry Maz
